name: mdSlide
tagline: The simplest presentation creating tool with Markdown
body:
![mdSlide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yhatt/mdslide/master/screenshot.png)

**mdSlide** is the simplest presentation creating tool, with using [Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown).

You can "write" the presentation with like a feeling of Markdown editor.

## Features

- **Create presentation slides by [Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown)**
- Cross-platform (Supported Windows, Mac OS X and Linux)
- Live preview with 3 modes (Markdown, 1:1 slide and list view)
- Export slides as PDF
- The most simple slide theme, based on GitHub style

## How to write slides?

A basically text format is based on [Github Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/).

The mdSlide has tiny change of horizontal ruler to create multi-page presentation. You can split page of presentation by `---` (This format is similar to [Deckset](http://www.decksetapp.com/)).

```md
# Slide 1

foobar

---

# Slide 2

foobar
```

Please refer [the slide example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yhatt/mdslide/master/example.md).
